description: This file defines a React functional component named Header, which serves as the application's header bar containing branding and action buttons such as favorites, sign out, and a link to React documentation.

methods.name: Header({ onOpenFavorites, onNavigateHome, children })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the application header with branding and action buttons.

methods.name: goHome
methods.description: Navigates to the home page when the brand button is clicked.

methods.name: openFav
methods.description: Opens the favorites view when the favorites button is clicked.

methods.name: onSignOut
methods.description: Signs out the user and navigates to the sign-in page when the sign-out button is clicked.

ctags.name: Header
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Header({ onOpenFavorites, onNavigateHome, children }) {$/
